title: PLS PLS HELP MY ACCOUNT HAS BEEN TAKEN OVER PLS help!!!!
body: PLS omg i didnt realise it showed your email when u go into your account PLS  WAHHT DO I DOOO pls tell me this nick33345 guy took my account it wont be loong until i cant use IT PLS HELP

replies.body: Aren't you the guillible kid who was scammed $20 yesterday?
I don't mean to sound rude, but you might want to take this to support. We're only players ourselves, we can't help you.
Ive tryed to get my account back but my user and pass and email are changed  pls i dont know what to do before its to late, ill give u as much proof as i can
There is literally 0 point in giving me proof, like I said, I'm not a Riot employee. I just play the game.
Im sorry but  i cant go to support because u need to confirm the support ticket thing with the email

add me i will help u
skype
( hsianghe5878 )
or add me on league if u have a smurf

Hi,

First things first - if your account has been compromised and you still have access, change your password immediately.

If you are no longer able to log in, the next best option is to get in touch with the support team (click "support" at the top right) and they will be able to help establish the account is yours, and will be able to help you.

-Mindstar
i will do anything to get it back pls ive spent over $500 and im so scared

> i will do anything to get it back pls ive spent over $500 and im so scared

you spent over 500 and only played 10 ranked games? also, unless you gave someone the passwords how can they possibly take your account?

> > i will do anything to get it back pls ive spent over $500 and im so scared
> 
> you spent over 500 and only played 10 ranked games? also, unless you gave someone the passwords how can they possibly take your account?

He probably bought it, hence why it cost so much.

Lol. If you verified your account, unless they have access to that email address you are fine. And if your email address password is that same as your LoL password, well then, you probably deserve to get your account "hacked"

Lesson learned.
